mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `ai_id` as aiId, `name`, `unit`, `maxmum`, `minmum`, `multiple`, `subscription_ratio` as subscriptionRatio , `gmt_create` as createTime, `gmt_modified` as modifyTime, `modifier_id` as modifierId, `creator_id as creatorId` FROM app_price_type WHERE 1 = 1 AND delflag = 0 AND ai_id =#{aiId}
